import React,{useState} from 'react' import SignUpModal from '../UI/SignUpModal' import classes from './Login.module.css' export default function Login(props) { const [email,setEmail]=useState(''); const [password,setPassword]=useState(''); const emailHandler=(e)=>{ setEmail(e.target.value) } const passwordHandler=(e)=>{ setPassword(e.target.value) } const registerHandler=()=>{ props.onHide(); props.onSignShow() } const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(email) console.log(password) } return (
Welcome Back
Don't have an account ? Register
) }
